name: Araku Tiki
description: +100 to Evasion Rating while on Low Life

flair: It is said to make you invisible when the Great
Spirit comes to take you on your final journey.

flair: "Hyrri and her Arrows broke the sacred code, damning herself.

-Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

name: Sidhebreath

(15-10)% reduced Mana Cost of Minion Skills

name: Karui Ward

name: Stone of Lazhwar

I am not.

description: Items and Gems have 25% reduced Attribute Requirements

We label each side: one Good, one Evil; one Black, one White.
The divine truth, however, is that both are one and the same.
-Jaetai, Vaal Advisor

name: Daresso's Salute
description: 10% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
+2 to Melee Weapon and Unarmed Attack range

Then you'll be short of a head soon enough."

name: Shaper's Seed
description: Nearby Allies gain 2% of Life Regenerated per second

name: Victario's Acuity

10% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill
5% increased Projectile Speed per Frenzy Charge
5% increased Projectile Damage per Power Charge

Grind your thoughts into the sharpest of deeds."
- Victario, the People's Poet

name: Astramentis
flair: Mindless rage will shake the world,
Cunning lies will bend it.
Reckless haste will break the world,
And into darkness send it.

name: Blood of Corruption
description: Grants Level 10 Gluttony of Elements Skill
Adds 19 to 43 Chaos Damage to Attacks
flair: In my dream, a voice spoke to me. It said:
'My reach knows no bounds.
All that is pure is destined to rot.
All that lives is destined to serve.'
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

name: Carnage Heart
description: (1.2-2)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
flair: Forged from the blood of countless wars,
its thirst has only begun.

This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Chayula

name: Hinekora's Sight
flair: Remember the past, anticipate the future.

name: Maligaro's Cruelty
description: (25-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by at least 5 Poisons
(12-15)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by fewer than 5 Poisons
10% increased Damage with Poison per Frenzy Charge
3% increased Poison Duration per Power Charge
flair: "He does not love. He does not feel regret or remorse.
He does not think about consequences, only possibilities.
If that does not describe a monster, tell me: what does?"
- Archbishop Geofri

name: Tear of Purity
description: Grants Level 10 Purity of Elements Skill
flair: A shimmering symbol of Purity, clear as water,
but I know better than most how quickly
Purity can succumb to Corruption.
How quickly water turns to blood.
- Victario, the People's Poet

name: Ungil's Harmony
flair: Gentle anger, raging calm.

name: Karui Charge
flair: For dead men require no answer.

Socketed Gems are supported by Level 10 Cast when Stunned

But every night they gather and grow,
and all but the strong and the stupid
seek shelter from their grasp until daybreak.

name: Blightwell
description: 30% slower start of Energy Shield Recharge during any Flask Effect
400% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate during any Flask Effect

who lit the ocean from within and kept the water fresh.
When the sky burned, the fish dived deep,
never to return, and the waters turned sour.

Modifiers to Claw Critical Strike Chance also apply to Unarmed Attack Critical Strike Chance
flair: I once thought the First Ones were just
stories made to scare children.
But I've seen what they can do. I've felt it.
And now I must live with that terrible knowledge.

name: Star of Wraeclast
description: 60% increased Area of Effect of Curse Skills
You cannot be Cursed with Silence
flair: "I offer to you an eternal oath
that binds your heart to mine;
a bond that not even death will break.
Will you accept?"
- Daresso, to his beloved

name: Perquil's Toe
description: Lightning Damage from Enemies Hitting you is Lucky

flair: He was a lot luckier before he lost this.

name: Bisco's Collar
description: (100-150)% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Magic Enemies
(35-50)% increased Quantity of Items Dropped by Slain Normal Enemies
flair: Friendship worth its weight in gold,
a treasure every day.
I thought together we'd grow old,
until fate pulled you away.

name: Sacrificial Heart

description: 10% increased Mana Regeneration Rate per Power Charge

description: Gain an Endurance Charge when you lose a Power Charge

Let the sinners come, for we - the Pure - shall endure!"

name: The Primordial Chain

binds in both directions.

name: The Halcyon
description: 60% increased Damage if you've Frozen an Enemy Recently

This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Tul

name: Xoph's Heart
description: Cover Enemies in Ash when they Hit you

To its beat we are all driven.
This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Xoph

name: Ngamahu Tiki
description: +100 to Evasion Rating while on Low Life

flair: Flames to guide the Great Spirit to the site of the dead,
and smoke to carry them into the sky.

name: Marylene's Fallacy
flair: "Marylene stroked the medallion at her breast before every duel and every cast of the die."

name: Voice of the Storm
description: Trigger Level 12 Lightning Bolt when you deal a Critical Strike

we bowed in awe and were crushed

name: The Anvil

Your blood on these hands of mine

Decides what lives and dies through me.
And will change the world through me.

The fool stood and questioned.
And the fool was unwritten.

Keep your blood in.

Mother Gull took pity on them
and gave them grain and water.

50% increased Mana Regeneration Rate during any Flask Effect

So the First Ones filled the sky with fire.

name: Perandus Blazon

name: The Magnate
description: +(20-25)% to all Elemental Resistances while you have at least 200 Strength

name: Belt of the Deceiver

name: Bated Breath

Our friendship was a joyful ride,
I wish you could have stayed.

name: Umbilicus Immortalis

name: Ryslatha's Coil

name: Sunblast

in pillars of blazing light,
Explodes from its cage.

Snap free from the prison

name: Immortal Flesh

Out of love the Earth agreed.
To the other Elements she did not speak
And out of spite They plotted."
- Berek and the Untamed

name: Coward's Legacy

Face it, or curse your bloodline for all eternity.

name: Dyadian Dawn

name: Emberwake

name: Mokou's Embrace

name: Andvarius

In the embrace of oblivious Frost

Berek taunted and jeered
Until furious Flame scaled the mountain
Berek escaped through the thaw
And Frost's tortured moans."
- Berek and the Untamed

Berek berated the clouds
Until vengeful Storm spewed forth his rains
And Berek held on tight
As Fire screamed and steamed
And fled."
- Berek and the Untamed

name: Call of the Brotherhood

name: Heartbound Loop

name: Kikazaru

Kaom took Rakiata's head and hand

as unpredictable and varied as they were,
all understood one thing:
Free thinking leads to free action.

name: Timeclasp

And awoke its Master.

name: Le Heup of All
implicit: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
flair: Existence is infinite
A weave of the living and dead
Beyond the understanding
Of the many mortal threads

name: Mark of Submission
description: Curse Enemies with Socketed Curse Gem on Hit

that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

30% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
10% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
flair: "Moon after moon did Berek make fools
Of the great and Untamed Three
Until malice for a Brother
Slew the hatred of the Other
And Berek did hunt
Alone and free."

implicit: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

My finger they took,
A shrouded mind,
Cut their curses short,
As I drained their spirit
And stole their soul.
A blessing is often a curse.

description: 0.4% of maximum Life Regenerated per second per Endurance Charge

flair: "This thing is not a pet. It is a parasite that feeds on the very will of its host.

name: Valako's Sign
description: 40% increased Damage with Hits against Shocked Enemies
0.2% of Damage Leeched as Life against Shocked Enemies

appointing Kiloava as the Herald of War.

name: Voideye

name: Death Rush
description: (0.6-0.8)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

name: Voidheart
implicit: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

Melee Attacks have (20-40)% chance to Poison on Hit

name: Ahkeli's Meadow

Some had once been her home.
Some had once been her creations.
Some had once been her family.
This item can be combined with a Mountain and Valley ring at a Vendor.

the Clayshaper sought safety in the clouds of ash above.
This item can be combined with a Meadow and Valley ring at a Vendor.

flair: The river, once fertile and fresh,
and flowing briskly to the sea,
now stood, stained, at a standstill.
Dammed by the coagulating dead.
This item can be combined with a Meadow and Mountain ring at a Vendor.

name: Circle of Anguish

flair: I condemned an innocent man to the pyres, but to admit this mistake is to condemn myself.
My only choice is to strive harder.

name: Circle of Fear
description: When used in the Synthesiser, the new item will have an additional Herald Modifier
flair: My subordinates circled me eternally, attuned to the slightest weakness, ready to tear me apart for their own gains.

name: Circle of Guilt
implicit: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
description: When used in the Synthesiser, the new item will have an additional Herald Modifier
flair: I feel the moral weight of what I must to do to protect Wraeclast. I accept my guilt without shame.
It is my gift to humanity.

name: Circle of Nostalgia
description: When used in the Synthesiser, the new item will have an additional Herald Modifier
flair: I was a happy child, before the cruel truth was revealed to me.
I fight so that the children may remain ignorant.

name: Circle of Regret
description: When used in the Synthesiser, the new item will have an additional Herald Modifier
flair: I sacrificed a life of love for one of responsibility, so that she, and others like her, might be kept safe.

An anomaly defying all odds

flair: History teaches humility.

name: Putembo's Meadow
flair: The fields were silent but for the plucking of fruits,
the rustling of leaves, and the breaking of stone.
No slave dared to speak or look the passing king in the eye.
No one... except Aul.

But this pilgrimage to the peak was to be his last.
This item can be combined with a Meadow and Valley ring at a Vendor.

name: Putembo's Valley
flair: With no stone for rebuilding, each storm took its toll on the village.
Huts eventually collapsed, their occupants injured or dead.
Bodies were left by the river, to appease the gods.
But the dead would not remain there.
This item can be combined with a Meadow and Mountain ring at a Vendor.

The gifts of the land lay hidden deeper,
and only patience and persistence would free them.
This item can be combined with a Mountain and Valley ring at a Vendor.

flair: The narrow path turned to rough rocks that led towards the sky.
One last obstacle in a life-long journey
to find a land they could call home.
This item can be combined with a Meadow and Valley ring at a Vendor.

flair: Sheltered beneath thick ice, the river ferried fat fish towards the sea.

This item can be combined with a Meadow and Mountain ring at a Vendor.

name: Rigwald's Crest

Mana Reservation of Herald Skills is always 45%
flair: Whiff of cold, tiny spark, faintest flicker in the dark.
Embers swirl, ice takes form, sky exposed - Death's perfect storm.
Frost and thunder, flames shine bright, ruin walks the land tonight.
By your hand they dance and bend, wield them and brook no end.

name: Cloak of Tawm'r Isley
description: Socketed Minion Gems are Supported by Level 16 Life Leech
Minions have 15% chance to Blind Enemies on hit
flair: Renowned by those distinguished,
Exalted by the few.
He skulks in darkness,
and watches from beneath the city.

name: Garb of the Ephemeral
info: Requires Level 56, 600 Str, 752 Int
description: Gain a Divine Charge on Hit
You gain Divinity for 10 seconds on reaching maximum Divine Charges
Lose all Divine Charges when you gain Divinity
Nearby Allies' Action Speed cannot be modified to below base value
Nearby Enemies cannot deal Critical Strikes
flair: Exceptional men and women of strong will can flicker a spark,
but something much greater is needed to unleash the wildfire of true divine flames.

name: Vis Mortis
description: Minions gain Unholy Might for 10 seconds on Kill
flair: Reap what others have sown
Muster them from their graves
Parade them for your pleasure
Zealots in mortis enslaved

name: Shavronne's Wrappings
description: 10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
Reflects 1 to 250 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
Chaos Damage does not bypass Energy Shield
flair: Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant
as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

name: Doedre's Skin
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Blasphemy
Grants Level 20 Summon Doedre's Effigy Skill
Socketed Curses are Triggered by Doedre's Effigy when Summoned
flair: As she was sentenced to death, Doedre was silent.
As she was tied to the stake, Doedre was silent.
As the flames licked away her life, Doedre was silent.
But Wraeclast had not heard the last of her.

name: Infernal Mantle
description: +1 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
15% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
25% increased Spell Damage taken when on Low Mana
flair: Despair hums, softly, deadly, in the bones of my enemies.
Eyes will burn, and souls wither, as they bask in my radiance.

name: Fenumus' Shroud
description: Enemies affected by your Spider's Webs deal 10% reduced Damage
Enemies affected by your Spider's Webs have -10% to All Resistances
(50-70)% increased Aspect of the Spider Area of Effect
flair: The First of the Night was the first explorer
It was she who first braved night's terrors and found comfort in silence and solace.

name: The Beast Fur Shawl
flair: The quickest way to understand
your own strengths and weaknesses
is to walk in the skin of another.

name: The Queen's Hunger
description: Trigger Level 20 Bone Offering, Flesh Offering or Spirit Offering every 5 seconds
Offering Skills Triggered this way also affect you
Your Offerings have 25% reduced Effect on you
flair: In their crimson nightmare, the Vaal are still sacrificing themselves to her glory and beauty.
They stab their own hearts and cry out in ecstasy, only to rise again.

name: Viper's Scales
info: Requires Level 28, 43 Str, 43 Dex
description: 20% chance to Poison on Hit with Attacks
flair: Cannot be Poisoned
Swift and silent.
One strike, one corpse.

name: Gruthkul's Pelt
info: Requires Level 38, 57 Str, 57 Dex
flair: Simple is the life of the bear.

name: Belly of the Beast
info: Requires Level 46, 68 Str, 68 Dex
flair: There is no safer place
Than the Belly of the Beast

name: Lightning Coil
info: Requires Level 60, 96 Str, 96 Dex
description: Adds 1 to (20-30) Lightning Damage to Attacks
30% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage
flair: "There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.

name: Daresso's Defiance
info: Requires Level 63, 115 Str, 94 Dex
description: (0.4-0.6)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You lose all Endurance Charges when Hit
You gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
You gain Onslaught for 5 seconds per Endurance Charge when Hit
flair: "When your back is against the wall,
And your opponent is bleeding you dry,
There is only one appropriate response:
Unbridled, overwhelming violence."
- Daresso, the Sword King

name: Cherrubim's Maleficence
info: Requires Level 69, 95 Str, 116 Dex
description: 100% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
flair: "The Consort of Chaos descended,
swiftly, brutally, artfully, she consumed the living,
leaving naught behind but a Rosemarie bloom,
to celebrate the massacre."
- Blass, explorer, hunter, adventurer

name: Farrul's Fur
info: Requires Level 69, 95 Str, 116 Dex
description: Aspect of the Cat Reserves no Mana
Gain up to your maximum number of Frenzy and Power Charges when you gain Cat's Stealth
You have Phasing while you have Cat's Stealth
flair: The First of the Plains was the First of the Hunt
It was she who showed us that there is honour in waiting in the shadows and picking your moment.

name: Voll's Protector
description: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike
flair: Although a great leader during the war,
Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

name: Icetomb
info: Requires Level 39, 59 Str, 59 Int
flair: When Solaris closes his burning eye
At the end of time,
the world will perish in ice.

name: Ambu's Charge
info: Requires Level 43, 64 Str, 64 Int
description: Gain an Endurance Charge when you take a Critical Strike
Share Endurance Charges with nearby party members
2% of Life Regenerated per second if you have been Hit Recently
flair: Nothing stops the pain like a courageous rush into battle.

name: Lightbane Raiment
info: Requires Level 47, 69 Str, 69 Int
description: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Reflects 30 Chaos Damage to Melee Attackers
100% chance to create Desecrated Ground when you Block
flair: . . . and the Light faded and hope waned
Zahndethus cast aside his faith
and embraced the darkness.

name: Crystal Vault
info: Requires Level 49, 59 Str, 59 Int
description: 20% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage
30% of Fire Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage
flair: Beneath the frozen eye of Lunaris
a new world will be born.
A crystalline, perfectly still utopia.

name: Kingsguard
info: Requires Level 61, 96 Str, 96 Int
description: Gain 100 Life when you lose an Endurance Charge
flair: The toughest armour is the trust of your people.

name: Geofri's Sanctuary
info: Requires Level 64, 90 Str, 105 Int
flair: Faith does not make us invulnerable.
It makes us immortal.

name: Loreweave
info: Requires Level 64, 90 Str, 105 Int
description: Adds (4-10) to (14-36) Physical Damage to Attacks
flair: When it comes to finding a use for surplus,
a rich man has within himself
boundless creativity.

name: Chains of Command
info: Requires Level 70, 99 Str, 115 Int
description: Animated Guardian deals 5% increased Damage per Animated Weapon
Animated Minions' Melee Attacks deal Splash Damage to surrounding targets

10% chance to Trigger Level 18 Animate Guardian's Weapon when Animated Weapon Kills an Enemy
flair: A general may carry his men to greatness, or be dragged beneath the mire by their burden.

name: Incandescent Heart
info: Requires Level 70, 99 Str, 115 Int
description: (0.8-1)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (10-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life
flair: Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

name: Bloodbond
info: Requires Level 35, 53 Dex, 53 Int
description: Minions have (6-10)% chance to Dodge Attack Hits
flair: What mother wouldn't give her life for that of her children?

name: Cloak of Defiance
info: Requires Level 52, 76 Dex, 76 Int
description: 10% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life
flair: Mind Over Matter
When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.

name: Victario's Influence
info: Requires Level 52, 76 Dex, 76 Int
description: +1 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Generosity
Socketed Gems have 30% reduced Mana Reservation
(20-40)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
(10-15)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
flair: "Every life is a story.
If you're not writing your own,
you'd better know who's writing it for you!"
- Victario, the People's Poet

name: Dendrobate
info: Requires Level 59, 86 Dex, 86 Int
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Lesser Poison
(75-100)% increased Damage with Poison if you have at least 300 Dexterity
(15-25)% increased Poison Duration if you have at least 150 Intelligence
flair: Ask any tracker and they'll tell you:
the most dangerous animals
are the ones who don't bother to hide.

name: Carcass Jack
info: Requires Level 62, 96 Dex, 96 Int
flair: "...The discomfort shown by the others is amusing, but none
can deny that my work has made quite the splash..."
- Maligaro's Journal

name: Saqawal's Nest
info: Requires Level 65, 107 Dex, 90 Int
description: 100% increased Aspect of the Avian Buff Effect
Aspect of the Avian also grants Avian's Might and Avian's Flight to nearby Allies
+(120-150) to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield
flair: The First of the Sky was the Last of the First.
It was he who showed us that our limits are self-imposed, that what we take for law may just be an illusion.

name: The Eternity Shroud
info: Requires Level 65, 107 Dex, 90 Int
description: Trigger Level 20 Glimpse of Eternity when Hit

Hits ignore Enemy Monster Chaos Resistance if all Equipped Items are Shaper Items
flair: There can be no defence against the celestial siblings entropy and time.

name: Inpulsa's Broken Heart
info: Requires Level 68, 103 Dex, 109 Int
description: (20-50)% increased Damage if you have Shocked an Enemy Recently
Shocked Enemies you Kill Explode, dealing 5% of
their Maximum Life as Lightning Damage which cannot Shock
flair: Don't hesitate; bring death to all, conclusively and swiftly, or they will give you the same treatment.

name: Tinkerskin
info: Requires Level 68, 103 Dex, 109 Int
description: (10-15)% increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for throwing Traps
15% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy

Recover 100 Life when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
Recover 50 Energy Shield when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
flair: Thin is the line between mechanical genius and magic.

name: Shroud of the Lightless
info: Requires Level 71, 88 Dex, 122 Int

1% increased Maximum Mana per Abyss Jewel affecting you
flair: Look to the darkness for nourishment and you will never go hungry.

name: The Restless Ward

description: 1% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
100% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration
(20-30) Life Regenerated per second per Endurance Charge
flair: Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

name: Shadowstitch
info: Requires Level 72, 66 Str, 66 Dex, 66 Int
description: Recover (3-5)% of Maximum Life on Kill
Recover (3-5)% of Maximum Energy Shield on Kill
-(6-4)% to all Resistances for each Corrupted Item Equipped
8% increased Maximum Energy Shield for each Corrupted Item Equipped
6% increased Maximum Life for each Corrupted Item Equipped
Item has 6 Sockets and is fully linked (Hidden)
flair: Destined for sacrifice, they were dressed in garments that blurred the lines between this world and the next.

name: Atziri's Splendour - Armour / ES
info: Requires Level 75, 66 Str, 66 Dex, 66 Int
flair: "When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

name: Atziri's Splendour - Eva / ES
info: Requires Level 75, 66 Str, 66 Dex, 66 Int

name: Atziri's Splendour
info: Requires Level 75, 66 Str, 66 Dex, 66 Int

name: Atziri's Splendour
info: Requires Level 75, 66 Str, 66 Dex, 66 Int
flair: "When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

name: Stormcharger
description: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
flair: Like lightning, the Ezomyte cavalry need never strike twice.

name: Windscream
description: You can apply an additional Curse
flair: The mocking wind, a shielding spell,
The haunting screams, a maddening hell.

name: Redblade Tramplers
description: Adds (2-5) to (7-10) Physical Damage to Attacks
flair: Our home was swallowed beneath
the great mountain for our complacency.
Now we must prove our value to the Molten One
by sating his hunger for life.

name: Craiceann's Tracks
description: Cannot be Stunned if you have at least 10 Crab Barriers
You only lose (5-7) Crab Barriers when you take Physical Damage from a Hit
flair: When the land rose above the sea, The First of the Deep did not move.
When the sky turned to fire, The First of the Deep did not perish.
We must remember our place, and play to our strengths.

name: The Infinite Pursuit
description: Moving while Bleeding doesn't cause you to take extra Damage
50% chance to be inflicted with Bleeding when Hit by an Attack
flair: We move to be close and grow no closer to her.

name: Windshriek
description: You can apply an additional Curse (Hidden)
60% increased Area of Effect of Curse Skills
flair: An open mouth, a blinding shriek,
Your mind goes dark, your body weak.

name: Doryani's Delusion
description: Grants Level 25 Purity of Ice Skill
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
flair: "Every day we choose safety or knowledge. Live and stagnate, or risk death for truth.
I would rather see the end of the Vaal than help it tread water."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

name: Kaom's Roots
description: Action Speed cannot be modified to below base value
flair: Don't flinch. It's a waste of good hitting time.

name: The Red Trail
description: 10% additional Physical Damage Reduction while stationary
Gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit while Bleeding
50% chance to be inflicted with Bleeding when Hit by an Attack
flair: We leave a trail, that we may know
where never we will return.

name: Seven-League Step
flair: "Death can be outrun with these, but beware!
In running from death, you may forget to live."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 202

name: Abberath's Hooves
description: Triggers Level 7 Abberath's Fury when Equipped
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy
flair: The goat king knew not of war,
of the lands and laws he trampled.
The goat king knew only joy
at turning life into ash.

name: Victario's Flight
description: (5-10)% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
10% increased Movement Speed for you and nearby Allies
flair: Alive but not unscathed, Victario fled
as slaughter blossomed at the gates.

name: Deerstalker
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 11 Trap
15% increased Movement Speed for 9 seconds on Throwing a Trap
flair: Anticipation, preparation, exhilaration, celebration.

name: Goldwyrm
flair: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

name: The Blood Dance
description: 2% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
3% reduced Attack and Cast Speed per Frenzy Charge
0.5% of Life Regenerated per second per Frenzy Charge
(20-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
6% increased Damage per Frenzy Charge with Hits against Enemies on Low Life
flair: "Sharks thrash and swirl
To the pounding drum of their frenzied hearts
As they dance in the waters red."
-Lavianga, Guardian of the Karui Way

name: Three-step Assault
description: 10% chance to Dodge Spell Hits while Phasing
flair: Move in with haste.
Strike quick, strike hard.
Vanish like smoke in the wind.

name: Garukhan's Flight
description: Immune to Burning Ground, Shocked Ground and Chilled Ground
100 Life Regenerated per second while moving
flair: The higher you soar, the further you must fall.

name: Sin Trek
description: Enemies Cannot Leech Life From you
flair: Do not let them step on your feet. Keep them at bay.

name: Atziri's Step
flair: "Those who dance are considered insane
by those who cannot hear the music."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

name: Doryani's Delusion
description: Grants Level 25 Purity of Ice Skill
Adds (25-30) to (40-45) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
flair: "Every day we choose safety or knowledge. Live and stagnate, or risk death for truth.
I would rather see the end of the Vaal than help it tread water."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

name: Farrul's Chase
description: Trigger Level 20 Intimidating Cry when you lose Cat's Stealth
20% increased Movement Speed while you have Cat's Stealth
flair: A secret is a weapon your enemies do not have.
When the First of the Plains hunted, she moved in silence and acted quickly.
To do otherwise is to arm your foes.

name: Wanderlust
flair: All the world is my home.

name: Wondertrap
description: 100% increased Rarity of Items found when on Low Life
flair: Wonders abound at death's door.

name: Bones of Ullr
flair: The dead man walks where
the living fear to tread.

name: Shavronne's Gambit
description: 20% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
1% of Energy Shield Regenerated per second
flair: The Karui boats were closing the gap,
but Shavronne had laid for them one final trap.

name: Shavronne's Pace
description: 20% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
flair: Shavronne raced to Brutus' side,
her last hope against the Karui tide.

name: Greedtrap
description: (10-16)% increased Quantity of Items found when on Low Life
flair: A single taste leaves you wanting more.

name: Rainbowstride
flair: "They say that you should take life's troubles in your stride.
Some men have a longer stride than others."
- Gaius Sentari

name: Inya's Epiphany
description: 25% chance that if you would gain Power Charges, you instead gain up to
your maximum number of Power Charges
flair: Though the path we walk is the same,
each journey is different.

name: Doryani's Delusion - ES
description: Grants Level 25 Purity of Lightning Skill
Adds (1-3) to (68-72) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
flair: "Every day we choose safety or knowledge. Live and stagnate, or risk death for truth.
I would rather see the end of the Vaal than help it tread water."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

name: Skyforth
description: 25% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
Stun Threshold is based on 500% of your Mana instead of Life
flair: The quick die young, the brilliant go mad,
and the powerful stand alone in a wasteland of their own creation.

name: Steppan Eard
description: 20% increased Movement Speed on Shocked Ground
2% of Life Regenerated per second on Chilled Ground
flair: To fight an enemy on their lands is a tactical mistake.
Make those lands your own, and the mistake becomes theirs.

name: Dusktoe
info: Requires Level 18, 19 Str, 19 Dex
description: +50% to Chaos Resistance during any Flask Effect
Adds (15-20) to (25-30) Chaos Damage to Spells and Attacks during any Flask Effect
flair: "A lick of shadow may ease
the petty frictions of one's life."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

name: Lioneye's Paws
info: Requires Level 30, 30 Str, 30 Dex
description: Adds 12 to 24 Fire Damage to Attacks
40% reduced Movement Speed when on Low Life
Cannot be Stunned when on Low Life
flair: Stand and lead the righteous pride,
Fight till death, never hide.

name: Duskblight
info: Requires Level 40, 19 Str, 19 Dex
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Added Chaos Damage
+50% to Chaos Resistance during any Flask Effect
flair: "A taste of Midnight, and you may never see the dawn."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

name: Mutewind Whispersteps
info: Requires Level 42, 40 Str, 40 Dex
description: Adds (25-30) to (40-50) Cold Damage to Spells
(50-70)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
flair: Corruption sweeps across this land,
but our bloodline is clear.
It is our duty to keep it so.

name: Saqawal's Talons
info: Requires Level 59, 56 Str, 56 Dex
description: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Avian Skill
100 Life Regenerated per Second while you have Avian's Flight
12 Mana Regenerated per Second while you have Avian's Flight
flair: A bird, too heavily laden, cannot take flight.
The First of the Sky teaches us to put aside our possessions so that we may live more freely.

name: Darkray Vectors
info: Requires Level 65, 62 Str, 62 Dex
description: 5% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
2% chance to Dodge Attack Hits per Frenzy Charge
flair: "Sirrius flew on wings of light, faster than wind, faster
than thought. But try as he might to outrun the darkness,
it was there, at every turn, waiting for him."
- Azmerian legend

name: Wake of Destruction
info: Requires Level 28, 28 Str, 28 Int
description: Adds 1 to 120 Lightning Damage to Attacks
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee
flair: Tempest's power given form,
Flee before the walking storm.

name: Ralakesh's Impatience
info: Requires Level 36, 35 Str, 35 Int
description: Gain a Frenzy, Endurance, or Power Charge once per second while you are Stationary
Lose all Frenzy, Endurance, and Power Charges when you Move
flair: For the immortal, what is the difference
between an age and an instant?

name: Alberon's Warpath
info: Requires Level 49, 47 Str, 47 Int
description: Adds 1 to 80 Chaos Damage to Attacks
flair: Alberon walked among the accursed,
and they welcomed him.

name: Gang's Momentum
info: Requires Level 58, 54 Str, 54 Int
flair: Become one with the unstoppable flame.

name: March of the Legion
info: Requires Level 58, 54 Str, 54 Int
description: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 25 Blessing
flair: When the time comes to face evil, the faithful are never alone.

name: Death's Door
info: Requires Level 64, 62 Str, 62 Int
description: 50% increased Elemental Ailment Duration on you
Bleeding cannot be inflicted on you
flair: To extend your life as long as possible
is to extend all the maladies that come with it.

name: Nomic's Storm
info: Requires Level 16, 18 Dex, 18 Int
description: 15% increased Damage taken while on Full Energy Shield
20% increased Movement Speed while on Full Energy Shield
flair: It takes a clear mind to outrun a storm.

name: Sundance
info: Requires Level 27, 27 Dex, 27 Int
flair: Blazing body, shining bold.
Dance beneath the orb of gold!

name: Dance of the Offered
info: Requires Level 34, 34 Dex, 34 Int
description: You have Onslaught while not on Low Mana
flair: Facing their death,
the mind of a sacrifice
retreats into instinct and madness.

name: Brinerot Whalers
info: Requires Level 41, 40 Dex, 40 Int
flair: Those Theopolis fatcats put a price on our heads.
Let's see what they'll pay for their own.

name: Omeyocan
info: Requires Level 55, 52 Dex, 52 Int
description: 2% chance to Dodge Attack and Spell Hits per 500 Maximum Mana, up to 20%
You have Onslaught while not on Low Mana
Lose 7% of maximum Mana per Second
flair: Only a fool seeks meaning
in a life so fleeting.

name: Sunspite
info: Requires Level 59, 27 Dex, 27 Int
description: (75-125) Life Regenerated per second while Ignited
flair: Blazing body, shining bold.
Dance beneath the orb of gold!

name: Fenumus' Spinnerets
info: Requires Level 63, 62 Dex, 62 Int
description: Aspect of the Spider can inflict Spider's Web on Enemies an additional time
Gain (15-20) Energy Shield for each Enemy you Hit which is affected by a Spider's Web
(40-50)% increased Aspect of the Spider Debuff Duration
flair: When the fires spilled out of the mountain, The First of the Night wove a net and was carried into the night on its hot winds.
Though we cannot live without danger, we can learn to live with it.

name: Bubonic Trail
info: Requires Level 69, 82 Dex, 42 Int
description: Triggers Level 20 Death Walk when Equipped
10% increased Damage for each type of Abyss Jewel affecting you
flair: Even the dead serve the Lightless.

name: Voidwalker
info: Requires Level 69, 82 Dex, 42 Int
description: 20% chance to Avoid Projectiles while Phasing
You have Phasing if you've Killed Recently
Projectiles Pierce 5 additional Targets while you have Phasing
flair: Step into the void
and experience true freedom.

name: Lochtonial Caress
description: 10% chance to gain a Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charge on Kill
flair: Why cling to your sanity? It offers you nothing.
Surrender to me, and I will grant you everything.

name: Giantsbane
description: Adds (3-6) to (10-12) Physical Damage to Attacks
flair: The monstrous men of yore used bows, they were just bigger.

name: Meginord's Vise
description: 2% of Life Regenerated per second with at least 400 Strength
flair: Ride with pride,
strike with vengeance,
live with honour.

name: Winds of Change
description: 10% chance to Knock Enemies Back on hit
flair: Izaro was slow to see the treachery growing in his own court
and powerless to stop it once he had;
a captain sailing his own ship into rocks.

name: Empire's Grasp
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Knockback
flair: "I like my vassals at sword point,
but my enemies as close as the hilt."
- Emperor Chitus

name: Atziri's Acuity
description: You have Vaal Pact if you've dealt a Critical Strike Recently
flair: "The heart is the herald.
It will tell me when it is best to strike."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

name: Doryani's Fist
description: Adds (150-225) to (525-600) Lightning Damage to Unarmed Attacks
Adds (90-135) to (315-360) Lightning Damage to Spells while Unarmed
+30 Energy Shield gained on Killing a Shocked Enemy
flair: Doryani's ingenuity raised the Vaal Empire to unprecedented heights. His curiosity reduced it to ruins and bones.

name: Craiceann's Pincers
description: 10% chance that if you would gain a Crab Barrier, you instead gain up to
your maximum number of Crab Barriers
flair: The stone that stays in the waves soon crumbles to sand.
The First of the Deep teaches us to watch the tides
and choose our moments to move wisely.

name: Veruso's Battering Rams
description: 4% increased Melee Damage per Endurance Charge
You cannot be Shocked while at maximum Endurance Charges
flair: With unending determination and resolve he destroyed first the gates,
then the constructs guarding the tomb on the other side.

name: Hrimsorrow
description: Adds (5-7) to (13-15) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
50% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Reflects 10 Cold Damage to Melee Attackers
flair: Of ancient giants, none remain,
Their only trace is timeless pain.

name: Maligaro's Virtuosity
flair: Maligaro operated effortlessly,
with great speed and terrible consequences.

name: Hrimburn
description: Adds (5-7) to (13-15) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
50% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Reflects 10 Cold Damage to Melee Attackers
flair: Giant's blood you cannot tame,
as wild as an unwatched flame.

name: Oskarm
description: Curse Enemies with Level 10 Assassin's Mark on Hit
2% increased Attack Critical Strike Chance per 200 Accuracy Rating
flair: Land and sea did not dissuade,
nor did the Kelpie's maw;
the wild beast crossed half the world
to sate his hungry claw.

name: Sadima's Touch
description: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks
flair: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.

name: Doedre's Tenure
flair: While Doedre lacked Maligaro's sense of style,
she surpassed her master in pure malevolence.

name: Asenath's Gentle Touch
description: Curse Enemies with Level 10 Temporal Chains on Hit
flair: Cool the head and cool the blade.

name: Vixen's Entrapment
description: Trigger Socketed Curse Skill when you cast a Curse Skill
0.2% of Spell Damage Leeched as Energy Shield for each Curse on Enemy
You can apply an additional Curse
Curse Skills have (10-20)% increased Cast Speed
flair: "One coy look. One blown kiss. One word spoken.
One night I wish I'd forget."

name: Demon Stitcher
description: Sacrifice 5% of Life to gain that much Energy Shield when you Cast a Spell
flair: Xibaqua's treachery was met with divine fury.
One by one, the gods reclaimed their flesh, until all that remained was a droplet of pure light:
The first Vaal.

name: Kalisa's Grace
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Faster Casting
Gain +2% to Critical Strike Chance for 2 seconds after Spending a total of 800 Mana
flair: "You shall hang, in blissful agony, on my every note."
- Kalisa, Prima Donna of Sarn

name: Voidbringer
description: +1 to Level of Socketed Elemental Gems
(125-150)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
flair: Absolute corruption empowers absolutely.

name: Grip of the Council
description: Minions gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
flair: Death does not remove you from our grasp.
Death only brings you closer.

name: Doedre's Malevolence
description: Adds (48-56) to (73-84) Chaos Damage to Spells
+50 to Total Mana Cost of Skills
flair: It was Doedre who learned that pain is just as much about fear as it is about injury.

name: Allelopathy
flair: "Nothing is more natural than competition.
One feasts, another starves.
One blossoms, another withers.
And one cannot catch the golden sunlight
without casting a bitter shadow."
- Cadiro Perandus

name: Flesh and Spirit
info: Requires Level 15, 14 Str, 14 Dex
description: Recover 20% of your Maximum Life on Rampage
Kills grant an additional Vaal Soul if you have Rampaged Recently
flair: What is greed but trading a mountain of death for a sliver of life?

name: Slitherpinch
info: Requires Level 27, 22 Str, 22 Dex
description: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
flair: A soft caress in dead of night,
that slips about the neck, so tight.

name: Vaal Caress
info: Requires Level 27, 22 Str, 22 Dex
description: +2 to Level of Socketed Vaal Gems
You gain Onslaught for 5 seconds on using a Vaal Skill
flair: "The gems are strangely human at times.
They simply love to be held."
- Doryani, First Seer to the Queen

name: Aurseize
info: Requires Level 36, 29 Str, 29 Dex
flair: Wealth is not to be borne lightly.

name: Tombfist
info: Requires Level 36, 29 Str, 29 Dex
description: With a Murderous Eye Jewel Socketed, Intimidate Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit with Attacks
With a Searching Eye Jewel Socketed, Maim Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit with Attacks
flair: "Ever watched a man crush another man's skull?
Hard to feel hope after that."

name: Haemophilia
info: Requires Level 43, 34 Str, 34 Dex
description: Attacks have 25% chance to cause Bleeding
(25-40)% increased Attack Damage against Bleeding Enemies
Bleeding Enemies you Kill Explode, dealing 5% of
their Maximum Life as Physical Damage
flair: "A master artist takes his time when he's painting.
Unfortunately, my kind doesn't often have that luxury."
- Coralito, Brotherhood of Silence

name: Wyrmsign
info: Requires Level 49, 38 Str, 38 Dex
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Concentrated Effect
4% reduced Mana Cost per Endurance Charge
Gain Rampage while at Maximum Endurance Charges
Lose all Endurance Charges when Rampage ends
flair: Those who witness the shimmering scales of the wyrm
know only fear for the rest of their lives.
Fortunately, the rest of their lives
can be measured in seconds.

name: Farrul's Pounce
info: Requires Level 59, 45 Str, 45 Dex
description: Attacks always inflict Bleeding while you have Cat's Stealth
(40-50)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Bleeding Enemies
You have Crimson Dance while you have Cat's Stealth
flair: A hungry beast wastes no energy.
Every strike, no matter how small, must work towards victory.
The First of the Plains teaches us that the largest prey can still be whittled away.

name: Surgebinders
info: Requires Level 67, 51 Str, 51 Dex
description: (4-7)% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
(4-7)% increased Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
(4-7)% increased Elemental Damage per Frenzy Charge
10% chance to Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
flair: Your lies are our strength.
Your threats are our laughter.
Your hate is our infinity
The fire rises!

name: Worldcarver
info: Requires Level 67, 51 Str, 51 Dex
description: Trigger Level 20 Arcane Wake after Spending a total of 200 Mana
3% increased Attack Speed for each Map Item Modifier affecting the Area
6% increased Attack Damage for each Map Item Modifier affecting the Area
flair: Is it better to find new lands - or to create them?

name: Shackles of the Wretched
info: Requires Level 7, 8 Str, 8 Int
description: Curses in this item are reflected back to you
You cannot be Chilled for 3 seconds after being Chilled
You cannot be Frozen for 3 seconds after being Frozen
You cannot be Ignited for 3 seconds after being Ignited
You cannot be Shocked for 3 seconds after being Shocked
You grant (4-6) Frenzy Charges to allies on Death
flair: Captivity breeds creativity.

name: Command of the Pit
info: Requires Level 37, 29 Str, 29 Int
description: With a Ghastly Eye Jewel Socketed, Minions have +1000 to Accuracy Rating
With a Hypnotic Eye Jewel Socketed, gain Arcane Surge on Hit with Spells
flair: We serve only the Night.

name: Volkuur's Guidance
info: Requires Level 43, 34 Str, 34 Int
description: Adds (16-20) to (25-30) (Fire/Cold/Lightning) Damage to Spells and Attacks
(Fire/Cold/Lightning) Skills have 20% chance to Poison on Hit
flair: You do not cease to be when you die.
Any more than the caterpillar ceases to be when it coccoons.
Come, let me show you.

name: Southbound
info: Requires Level 51, 40 Str, 40 Int
description: Adds (30-36) to (44-50) Cold Damage to Attacks
Your Hits can only Kill Frozen Enemies
flair: Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

name: Null and Void
info: Requires Level 57, 44 Str, 44 Int
description: Gain Immunity to Physical Damage for 1.5 seconds on Rampage
flair: What is freedom but a clean slate
in an unclean world?

name: Offering to the Serpent
info: Requires Level 57, 44 Str, 44 Int
description: 50% reduced Maximum Recovery per Life Leech
Life Leech effects are not removed at Full Life
flair: "You covet the strength of your peers, mortal?
Perhaps it can be yours, if you are willing to make an offering of their blood..."
- Vaal Myth of the Third Snake

name: Saqawal's Winds
info: Requires Level 64, 40 Str, 40 Int
description: Adds (20-25) to (37-40) Cold Damage while you have Avian's Might
Adds (1-3) to (55-62) Lightning Damage while you have Avian's Might
flair: When the inferno spread across the land, it was the First of the Skies who singed his feathers as he brought the flames to a standstill.

name: Repentance
info: Requires Level 66, 306 Str, 306 Int
flair: "I ask not for understanding,
only for forgiveness
for what I am about to do.
There will be blood on these shackles yet."
- Anonymous carving, Axiom Prison.

name: Shaper's Touch
info: Requires Level 66, 51 Str, 51 Int
description: 2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity
flair: By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.
Nothing.

name: Ondar's Clasp
info: Requires Level 5, 6 Dex, 6 Int
description: 30% increased Attack Speed when on Full Life
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks
20% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
flair: A single lightning strike fells a man.
A single knife stroke fells an empire.

name: Architect's Hand
info: Requires Level 16, 14 Dex, 14 Int
description: Skills used by Traps have (10-20)% increased Area of Effect
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also Apply to Trap Throwing Speed
flair: Great works take time.

name: Facebreaker
info: Requires Level 16, 14 Dex, 14 Int
description: (600-800)% more Physical Damage with Unarmed Attacks
flair: Fly like a Storm Crow, crush like a Rhoa

name: Aukuna's Will
info: Requires Level 31, 25 Dex, 25 Int
description: Raised Zombies hve 97% Increased Maximum Life
Raise Zombie does not require a Corpse
Your Raised Zombies count as Corpses
flair: The Black Sekhema's Trial had only just begun

name: Shadows and Dust
info: Requires Level 31, 25 Dex, 25 Int
description: 0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Creates a Smoke Cloud on Rampage
Gain Unholy Might for 3 seconds on Rampage
flair: What is fear but a snuffed torch
and death in the wind?

name: Slavedriver's Hand
info: Requires Level 45, 35 Dex, 35 Int
description: Skills which throw Traps have Blood Magic
Skills used by Traps have (10-20)% increased Area of Effect
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also Apply to Trap Throwing Speed
10% chance to gain an Endurance, Frenzy or Power Charge when any
of your Traps are Triggered by an Enemy
flair: A plan without a deadline stays a plan.

name: Fenumus' Weave
info: Requires Level 50, 39 Dex, 39 Int
description: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Spider Skill
(40-60)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Enemies affected by 3 Spider's Webs
Adds (8-10) to (13-15) Chaos Damage for each Spider's Web on the Enemy
flair: A burden shared is a burden made lighter. The First of the Night teaches us that our burdens are not just ours to bear, but ours to use against oppressors.

name: The Embalmer
info: Requires Level 50, 39 Dex, 39 Int
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Vile Toxins
flair: "Decomposition takes hold too quickly!
No, if we are to keep the specimen in perfect shape,
we must begin the process before expiry."

name: Blasphemer's Grasp
info: Requires Level 58, 45 Dex, 45 Int
description: 15% increased Damage with Ailments per Elder Item Equipped
+6 to Maximum Life per Elder Item Equipped
8% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments per Elder Item Equipped
Remove an Ailment when you use a Flask if all Equipped Items are Elder Items
flair: Reaching nature's limits,
many sought power in the unnatural.

name: Snakebite
info: Requires Level 58, 45 Dex, 45 Int
description: 2% increased Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
6% increased Accuracy Rating per Frenzy Charge
10% reduced Frenzy Charge Duration per Frenzy Charge
Attacks have 60% chance to Poison while at maximum Frenzy Charges
flair: "As the serpent shuns thought,
It shuns fear.
It strikes with the speed of wrath
And the skill of compulsion."
- Deshret, The Red Sekhema

name: Storm's Gift
info: Requires Level 58, 45 Dex, 45 Int
description: Shocks you inflict spread to other Enemies within a Radius of 15
flair: The power of lightning is a power best shared.

name: Malachai's Mark
info: Requires Level 67, 51 Dex, 51 Int
description: Grants Malachai's Endurance, Frenzy and Power for 6 seconds each, in sequence
flair: What man does not wish for immortality?

name: Thunderfist
info: Requires Level 67, 51 Dex, 51 Int
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Added Lightning Damage
Adds 1 to 100 Lightning Damage to Attacks
flair: The roar of the heavens
Strikes more than fear
Into the hearts of Man

name: Ezomyte Hold
flair: A moment of victory may last an eternity in memory.

name: Ezomyte Peak
flair: Centuries of servitude, a day
of glory, an eternity of death.

name: The Baron
description: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
Half of your Strength is added to your Minions
+1 to maximum number of Zombies per 300 Strength
With at least 1000 Strength, 2% of Damage dealt by your Zombies is Leeched to you as Life
flair: "The Emperor's trusted surgeons are not the only ones who practice the dark arts. Some of us are just more discreet."

name: The Formless Flame
description: Armour is increased by Uncapped Fire Resistance
flair: Our skin turns to ash
and we are swallowed by his brilliant red light.
This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Xoph

name: Hrimnor's Resolve
description: Cannot be Chilled or Frozen if you have used a Fire Skill Recently
flair: Hrimnor's presence was as cold as ice,
but his heart burned for vengeance.

name: Abyssus
description: Adds 40 to 60 Physical Damage to Attacks
flair: When you have slain all of your enemies,
what is left to fear?

name: The Formless Inferno
description: 8% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Fire Damage
Armour is increased by Uncapped Fire Resistance
flair: He burns us to keep us from harm.

name: Goldrim
description: Reflects 4 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
flair: No metal slips as easily through the fingers as gold.

name: Fairgraves' Tricorne
description: Adds 6 to 12 Cold Damage to Attacks
flair: Fairgraves' trusty tricorne accompanied him far across
the seas, deep under the ground, and even beyond death.

name: Heatshiver
description: (20-30)% increased Cold Damage if you have used a Fire Skill Recently
(20-30)% increased Fire Damage if you have used a Cold Skill Recently
flair: Give of your heated passions.
Give of your cold resolve.
You will be repaid.

name: Rat's Nest
flair: A lad with no fear of the pest
Let rats fill his helmet in jest
When they picked his skull clean
Where his head should have been
Was naught but a vermin-filled nest!

name: Frostferno
description: +2 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
+2 to Level of Socketed Cold Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Cold to Fire
flair: Embrace your burning ambition.
Embrace your frozen heart.
You will be transformed.

name: Saqawal's Flock
description: 25% chance to Trigger Level 20 Tornado when you gain Avian's Might or Avian's Flight
flair: Though we are individual, we share the same plight.
The First of the Sky teaches us that unity and selflessness, not division and greed, is what will carry us upwards.

name: Starkonja's Head
description: 50% reduced Damage when on Low Life
150% increased Global Evasion Rating when on Low Life
flair: There was no hero made out of Starkonja's death,
but merely a long sleep made eternal.

name: Alpha's Howl
description: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
flair: Nature respects the strong
And paints the snow red
With the blood of the weak

name: Obscurantis
description: 1% increased Projectile Attack Damage per 200 Accuracy Rating
flair: If you know where to strike, you need only strike once.

name: Crown of Thorns
description: Reflects 5 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
Take 5 Physical Damage when Hit by Attacks
flair: Lift it lightly, don it slow.
The spikes point out and in, you know.

name: Asenath's Mark
flair: Asenath's mind was as quick and nimble
as the fingers that drew her bowstring.

name: Wreath of Phrecia
description: Increases and Reductions to Light Radius also apply to Area of Effect at 50% of their Value
Increases and Reductions to Light Radius also apply to Damage
flair: The Light drove the Darkness from our lands and from our hearts

name: Maw of Conquest
description: 64% Increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
13% of Damage Taken Gained as Life Over 4 Seconds when Hit
flair: Young Napuatzi was thrown into the pits, an unwilling sacrifice,
but the offer of her blood was refused.
She rose from the pit alive and anew.
A Leader. A Conquerer. A Viper.

name: Mark of the Red Covenant
description: 75% reduced Maximum number of Summoned Raging Spirits
Raging Spirits refresh their Duration when they Kill an Ignited Enemy
flair: Gleeful are the few
who bask in the blood of many.

name: Wraithlord
description: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
flair: Countless men proclaimed themselves the masters of death,
and each one succumbed to it.

name: Doedre's Scorn
description: +2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
Curse Skills have (30-50)% increased Skill Effect Duration
(10-20)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Curse on Enemy
flair: A scar of the flesh you'll never forget,
A scar of the mind you'll never remember.

name: Asenath's Chant
description: 25% chance to Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Attack with a Bow
flair: Asenath loosed arrows with almost musical rhythm,
a rhythm matched by her nearly inaudible whispers,
and the crunch of the dead hitting the dust.

name: Martyr's Crown
description: Reflects 5 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
Take 5 Physical Damage when Hit by Attacks
flair: Let it pierce you, let blood flow.
Make more room for the soul to grow.

name: Chitus' Apex
flair: "It takes true strength to hold power,
and my grip grows tighter by the day."
- Emperor Chitus

name: The Devouring Diadem
description: Socketed Gems have 20% reduced Mana Reservation
Trigger Level 15 Feast of Flesh every 5 seconds
10% chance for Energy Shield Recharge to start when you use a Skill
flair: The spirit hungers for the flesh.

name: Flamesight
description: 10% increased Elemental Damage per Sextant affecting the area
flair: See creation as it was, aflame and frantic.

name: Galesight
description: 10% increased Elemental Damage per Sextant affecting the area
flair: See creation as it will be, frozen and silent.

name: Thundersight
description: 10% increased Elemental Damage per Sextant affecting the area
flair: See creation as it is, energetic and storming.

name: Fenumus' Toxins
description: Adds (16-21) to (31-36) Chaos Damage to Spells
10% chance to gain a Power Charge on hitting an Enemy affected by a Spider's Web
(6-10)% chance to Poison per Power Charge
(15-20)% increased Damage with Poison per Power Charge
Aspect of the Spider inflicts Spider's Webs and Hinder every 0.5 Seconds instead
flair: A hunter uses everything at their disposal.
The First of the Night did not hold back her venom. She used it to weaken her enemies, and used her enemies to strengthen her many children.

name: Hale Negator
description: +1 to Maximum Spirit Charges per Abyss Jewel affecting you
Gain a Spirit Charge every second
You lose all Spirit Charges when taking a Savage Hit
Recover (2-3)% of Life when you lose a Spirit Charge
Recover (2-3)% of Energy Shield when you lose a Spirit Charge
flair: "Feel the pain of ancient wounds.
Feel the doom of dying souls."

name: Rime Gaze
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Concentrated Effect
+(16-22)% to Cold Damage over Time Multiplier
flair: The malice in her gaze froze blood and shattered bone.

name: Scold's Bridle
description: Your Skills deal you 400% of Mana Spent on Skill Mana Costs as Physical Damage
flair: "The sharper the pain, the sharper the mind.
A curious paradox."
- Shavronne of Umbra

name: Crown of Eyes
description: (0.4-0.8)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
(0.2-0.4)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Increases and Reductions to Spell Damage also apply to Attacks
flair: Turning, gazing, blinking,
behold the eyes of void.
Burning, razing, drinking,
your mind is destroyed.

name: Eber's Unification
description: Trigger Level 10 Void Gaze when you use a Skill
Gain (5-8)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
flair: The impediments of flesh are weak.
The air we breathe knows no such boundaries.
I exhale, and you inhale,
and inexorably we inch towards oneness.

name: Indigon
description: Recover (8-10)% of maximum Life when you use a Mana Flask
Non-instant Mana recovery from Flasks is also recovered as Life
(50-60)% increased Mana Cost of Skills for each 200 total Mana you have Spent Recently
(20-25)% increased Spell Damage for each 200 total Mana you have Spent Recently, up to 2000%
flair: Where the body's limits begin,
the mind's limits end.

name: Ylfeban's Trickery
description: Trigger Level 10 Shock Ground when Hit
Adds 1 to (60-80) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
20% chance to Curse non-Cursed Enemies with a random Curse on Hit
flair: An angry god is one thing,
but you should really fear a god
with an unpredictable sense of humour.

name: The Peregrine
info: Requires Level 23, 28 Str, 28 Dex
description: 0.4% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
flair: We wander to pass time.
We travel to fulfill.

name: Deidbell
info: Requires Level 33, 38 Str, 38 Dex
description: Adds 10 to 20 Physical Damage to Attacks
Cannot Leech when on Low Life
flair: May you never hear it toll.

name: Deidbellow
info: Requires Level 33, 38 Str, 38 Dex
description: Adds 10 to 20 Physical Damage to Attacks
Cannot Leech when on Low Life
You and nearby allies have 20% increased Attack, Cast and Movement Speed if you've Warcried Recently
flair: May it echo through the halls.

name: Skullhead
info: Requires Level 36, 42 Str, 42 Dex
description: Minions have +10% Chance to Block Attack Damage
flair: All that was left of the Iron King was his bleached skull.
Yet it was all the Iron King needed.

name: Black Sun Crest
info: Requires Level 51, 57 Str, 57 Dex
flair: The beasts we fear the most
are the ones who dwell in total darkness.

name: Devoto's Devotion
info: Requires Level 67, 62 Str, 85 Dex
flair: Swift as thought are the actions of Man
when borne on wings of divine providence.

name: The Bringer of Rain
info: Requires Level 67, 62 Str, 85 Dex
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Melee Physical Damage
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Faster Attacks
Socketed Gems are supported by Level 18 Blind
Adds 20 to 30 Physical Damage to Attacks
20% chance to gain an Endurance Charge when you Bloc
flair: "What lies beneath your feet?!"
"Sacred ground, watered with tears of blood!"

name: Honourhome
info: Requires Level 12, 16 Str, 16 Int
description: Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks
flair: "The craven mind is sharp with self interest.
The honourable mind is much easier to manipulate."
- Malachai the Soulless

name: Veil of the Night
info: Requires Level 22, 27 Str, 27 Int
description: Reflects 1 to (180-220) Lightning Damage to Attackers on Block
flair: The seeds of greatness are planted in darkness,
Watered by suffering,
Tended by desperation,
And bloom steel flowers of victory.

name: Mask of the Spirit Drinker
info: Requires Level 31, 36 Str, 36 Int
description: Your Energy Shield starts at zero
50 Life Regenerated per second if you have at least 500 Maximum Energy Shield
100 Life Regenerated per second if you have at least 1000 Maximum Energy Shield
150 Life Regenerated per second if you have at least 1500 Maximum Energy Shield
flair: Our flesh is our most sacred gift.
Taint it not with the occult.

name: Mindspiral
info: Requires Level 37, 42 Str, 42 Int
description: Gain (5-10)% of Maximum Mana as Extra Maximum Energy Shield
Enemies Cannot Leech Mana From you
(5-10)% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit
flair: Where top is bottom and weak is strong.

name: Kitava's Thirst
info: Requires Level 44, 50 Str, 50 Int
description: 30% chance to Trigger Socketed Spells when
you Spend at least 100 Mana to Use a Skill
flair: Tukohama, Tawhoa and Kitava went to the lake to fish.
Tawhoa weaved a net to catch the fish,
Tukohama built a fire to cook the fish,
and Kitava swallowed the entire lake, fish and all, with a single gulp.

name: Geofri's Crest
info: Requires Level 53, 59 Str, 59 Int
flair: In the battle for honour, Geofri won.
Not so, the battle for survival.

name: Lightpoacher
info: Requires Level 53, 59 Str, 59 Int
description: Trigger Level 20 Spirit Burst when you Use a Skill while you have a Spirit Charge
Recover (4-5)% of Life when you lose a Spirit Charge
(15-20)% chance to gain a Spirit Charge on Kill
+1 to Maximum Spirit Charges per Abyss Jewel affecting you
flair: The eyes of the living hold a glimmer of hope.
Don't waste it.

name: Craiceann's Chitin
info: Requires Level 58, 64 Str, 64 Int
description: Cannot lose Crab Barriers if you have lost Crab Barriers Recently
+3% Chance to Block Attack Damage while you have at least 5 Crab Barriers
+5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while you have at least 10 Crab Barriers
flair: When the rains come, we cower beneath shelter.
The First of the Deep teaches us
that we should seek no shelter but ourselves.

name: Crown of the Tyrant
info: Requires Level 58, 64 Str, 64 Int
description: Nearby Enemies have -10% to all Resistances
You and Nearby Allies have 64 to 96 added Fire Damage per Red Socket
You and Nearby Allies have 56 to 88 added Cold Damage per Green Socket
You and Nearby Allies have 16 to 144 added Lightning Damage per Blue Socket
You and Nearby Allies have 47 to 61 added Chaos Damage per White Socket
flair: You will know if your subjects follow you from fear or respect when you have your first moment of weakness.
If it's the former, they will tear you into pieces like rabid dogs.

name: Mask of the Stitched Demon
info: Requires Level 58, 64 Str, 64 Int
description: Strength provides no bonus to Maximum Life
Intelligence provides no bonus to Maximum Mana

name: Kingmaker
info: Requires Level 66, 140 Str, 86 Dex
description: Nearby Allies have 30% increased Item Rarity
Insufficient Mana doesn't prevent your Melee Attacks
Nearby Allies have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier
flair: A King and his people are linked together
like a soul and a beating heart.
Both can be severed by a same edge,
then forged anew.

name: Kitava's Feast
info: Requires Level 68, 149 Str, 76 Dex
description: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 25 Melee Splash
1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Recover 5% of Maximum Life on Kill
Enemies you hit are destroyed on Kill
flair: Hinekora bound Kitava to a rock
that Kitava could not lift with all his might.
Kitava vowed that when he broke free,
he would devour every soul in Hinekora's domain.

name: Atziri's Disfavour
info: Requires Level 75, 158 Str, 76 Dex
description: +2 to Level of Socketed Support Gems
25% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
flair: "I do not believe in disguising my disappointment."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

name: Silverbranch
description: +1 to Level of Socketed Bow Gems
flair: "The wild takes care of its own."
- Hyrri of the Karui

name: Quill Rain
description: +2 Mana gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
flair: "The rain of a thousand quills that whittle
present into past, life into death."
- Rigwald of the Ezomytes

name: Storm Cloud
flair: Centuries of development in steel armoursmithing
turned the armies of the Eternal Empire
into very effective lightning rods.

name: Roth's Reach
description: (20-40)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
flair: "Exiled to the sea; what a joke.
I'm more free than I've ever been."
- Captain Weylam "Rot-tooth" Roth of the Black Crest

name: Xoph's Inception
description: +(20-30) Life gained on Killing Ignited Enemies
Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
flair: Upon the red pyre we are born.
This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Xoph

name: Doomfletch
description: (20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
Gain 100% of Weapon Physical Damage as Extra Damage of a random Element
flair: "Toasted or frozen
Or twitching in the light
I'm not fussy
And neither is Death."
- Koralus Doomfletch

name: Death's Harp
description: Bow Attacks fire an additional Arrow
flair: The mournful music of the strings,
The creaking arch, the arrow sings.
A choking cry, a rattled breath,
The Reaper's Song, the Harp of Death.

name: Iron Commander
description: Siege Ballista has +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems per 200 Dexterity
Adds 1 to 3 Physical Damage to Attacks per 25 Dexterity
flair: The Eternals commanded an army that need not eat, sleep, or breathe
without the usual depravities of necromancy.

name: The Tempest
flair: Where steel-grey clouds gather and crash together, a storm is sure to follow.

name: Silverbough
description: +1 to Level of Socketed Bow Gems
flair: The lone tree grows thickest.

name: Doomfletch's Prism
description: (20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
Gain 100% of Weapon Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element
flair: "The Vaal, a thousand years ago,
came up with more delightful methods of murder
than I could ever wish for."
- Koralus Doomfletch

name: Death's Opus
description: Bow Attacks fire an additional Arrow
Bow Attacks fire an additional Arrow
flair: The overture stretches thin,
The chorus gathers to begin.
Stacatto, drone, a rest drawn long,
Another hears Death's final song.

name: Infractem
flair: Mark us with mercy, then press on with care,
Execute us steadily, notch away at our despair.

name: The Crimson Storm
description: 50% chance to inflict Bleeding on Critical Strike with Attacks
Enemies you inflict Bleeding on grant (60-100)% increased Flask Charges
Adds (100-120) to (150-165) Physical Damage against Bleeding Enemies
50% chance to Maim Enemies on Critical Strike with Attacks
flair: "There were no survivors. It had only been fired twice."
- Order of the Djinn inscription

name: Hopeshredder
description: 4% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
12 to 14 Cold Damage per Frenzy Charge
2% chance to Avoid Elemental Damage when Hit per Frenzy Charge
0.5% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life per Frenzy Charge
200 Cold Damage taken per second per Frenzy Charge while moving
flair: Their last thoughts were not of their friends,
or their families, or their homes.
Their last thoughts were untethered from reality,
and bathed in fear and ferocity.

name: Null's Inclination
info: Requires Level 60, 212 Dex, 212 Int
description: Minions deal 1% increased Damage per 10 Dexterity
Trigger Socketed Minion Spells on Kill with this Weapon
flair: The hunt continues when the prey falls.

name: Arborix
description: Every 16 seconds you gain Iron Reflexes for 8 seconds
30% more Damage with Arrow Hits at Close Range while you have Iron Reflexes
30% increased Attack, Cast and Movement Speed while you do not have Iron Reflexes
You have Far Shot while you do not have Iron Reflexes
flair: Through droughts, fires, floods and frost,
the ancient giants stand resolute,
while deep in the rich, dark earth,
their grasp stretches ever farther.

name: Chin Sol
description: 50% More Damage with Arrow Hits at Close Range
flair: As a soldier you want to get close to enemy archers.
That is not the case when fighting the Maraketh.

name: Darkscorn
description: 25% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
25% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
flair: "The Spirit of War knows nothing of good and evil.
It knows only destruction."
- Sekhema Asenath

name: Reach of the Council
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Greater Volley
flair: We stand together. We strike together.

name: Voltaxic Rift
description: 60% of Lightning Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
flair: The eldritch storm descended upon us, and bruised lightning
rained down. Metal withered and flesh melted before its
arcane power. There was no escape, no shelter. Only despair.

name: Xoph's Nurture
description: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Ignites you inflict spread to other Enemies within a Radius of 15
Recover (40-60) Life when you Ignite an Enemy
flair: Upon the grey winds his love spreads.

name: Lioneye's Glare
description: (20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
flair: "See without doubt, slay without hesitation."
- Marceus Lioneye of Sarn

name: Windripper
description: (20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
15% increased Quantity of Items Dropped by Slain Frozen Enemies
30% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Shocked Enemies
flair: It hunts; as silent as falling snow, as deadly as the tempest.

name: Nuro's Harp
description: 15% chance to create Chilled Ground when you Freeze an Enemy
Create Consecrated Ground when you Shatter an Enemy
flair: Night's frost becomes morning's dew
Darkness cleansed, pure and new.

name: Slivertongue
description: (150-200)% increased Critical Strike Chance with arrows that Fork
Arrows Pierce all Targets after Forking
Arrows that Pierce have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier
flair: A hundred blind heads, each seeking the taste of prey on the air.

name: Last Resort
info: Requires Level 3, 11 Dex, 11 Int
implicit: +3 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
description: 25% increased Attack Speed when on Low Life
100% increased Claw Physical Damage when on Low Life
100% increased Accuracy Rating when on Low Life
flair: Desperate times demand desperate measures.

name: Wildslash
info: Requires Level 12, 25 Dex, 25 Int
implicit: +7 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
description: 15% increased Attack Speed with Movement Skills
flair: There are two things to know about fighting:
When to swing like crazy, and when to run.

name: Hand of Thought and Motion
info: Requires Level 22, 41 Dex, 41 Int
implicit: +12 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
description: Adds 1 to 5 Lightning Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Intelligence
(20-25)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
flair: She carries us and nurtures us
until we must feed upon each other.

name: Al Dhih
info: Requires Level 26, 39 Dex, 56 Int
implicit: +19 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
description: Socketed Gems have 10% chance to cause Enemies to Flee on Hit
Trigger Level 1 Abyssal Cry on Hit
3% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
10% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon
flair: "When the hyena howls thrice
death is sure to follow."
-Maraketh Wisdom

name: Mortem Morsu
info: Requires Level 34, 61 Dex, 61 Int

description: (10-20)% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
25% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon
flair: Fear blisters the heart and thins the blood.
Fear squeezes lungs and sets the guts to fester.
Fear is the wound left untended.

name: Cybil's Paw
info: Requires Level 37, 53 Dex, 77 Int
implicit: +25 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
description: +(5-8) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Spells
8% increased Spell Damage per 5% Chance to Block Attack Damage
flair: Tread lightly, lest their vigil find you.
Speak softly, lest their reason fend you.
Cut gently, lest their spirit haunt you.

name: Advancing Fortress
info: Requires Level 46, 80 Dex, 80 Int
implicit: +44 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 12 Fortify
Reflects (71-90) Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
flair: "A man cowers behind his walls.
A woman carries her fortress with her.
In heart, in mind, in hand."
- Sekhema Deshret

name: Ornament of the East
info: Requires Level 46, 80 Dex, 80 Int
implicit: +44 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Faster Attacks
+1 to Level of Socketed Dexterity Gems
flair: To the Maraketh, death is as intimate as love.

name: The Wasp Nest
info: Requires Level 60, 113 Dex, 113 Int
implicit: +40 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
description: Attacks with this Weapon deal 80-120 added Chaos Damage against
Enemies affected by at least 5 Poisons

you need only shake the wrong branch.

name: Bloodseeker
info: Requires Level 62, 131 Dex, 95 Int
implicit: 1.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
description: 1.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Life Leech from Hits with this Weapon is instant
flair: "For the life of the flesh will always be in the blood."
- Atalui, Vaal Priestess

name: Allure
info: Requires Level 66, 95 Dex, 131 Int
implicit: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
description: You gain Phasing for 10 seconds on using a Vaal Skill
flair: What drives us to kill, to carve and to shred?
What drives us to drink the seething souls of the dead?
What drives us to love and to hold, but still go amiss?
What drives us to leave this world for the Abyss?

name: Essentia Sanguis
info: Requires Level 66, 95 Dex, 131 Int
implicit: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
description: +8% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding Claws
Leech Energy Shield instead of Life
flair: The darkest clouds clashed and coupled,
giving birth to four lightning children of hate.

name: Hand of Wisdom and Action
info: Requires Level 68, 131 Dex, 95 Int
implicit: +46 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
description: Adds 1 to 10 Lightning Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Intelligence
(25-30)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
flair: She thinks and we act.
She acts and we think.
Fragments of the whole that washes clean the skies.

name: Izaro's Dilemma
info: Requires Level 68, 131 Dex, 95 Int
implicit: +46 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
description: 100% increased Global Physical Damage while Frozen
flair: Izaro saw himself not as a man,
but as a divine saviour trapped in a man's body.

name: Touch of Anguish

description: 20% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing a Frozen Enemy
Skills Chain an additional time while at maximum Frenzy Charges
Critical Strikes do not always Freeze
flair: Grip the frozen steel, feel it numb you.
Wield the cold touch of death like
a splinter of your own shattered heart.

name: Rive

description: 25% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
2% increased Physical Damage over time per 10 Dexterity
30% Chance to cause Bleeding Enemies to Flee on hit

Terror makes you run.

name: The Scourge
info: Requires Level 70, 113 Dex, 113 Int

comes an increasing desire for it.

name: Goredrill
info: Requires Level 5, 16 Dex, 11 Int
description: 50% chance to cause Bleeding on Critical Strike
40% increased Attack Damage against Bleeding Enemies

A peck on the cheek
A sip of your wine
So red and so sleek

name: Bloodplay
info: Requires Level 15, 30 Dex, 30 Int
description: 30% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
flair: "I'm a painter, and crimson is my chosen hue."
- Coralito, Brotherhood of Silence

name: Ungil's Gauche
info: Requires Level 20, 31 Dex, 45 Int
description: +12% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
flair: Unwieldy and garish became graceful
and deadly in Ungil's nimble hands.

name: Mightflay
info: Requires Level 35, 73 Dex, 51 Int
description: +10 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
flair: A mighty beast, a lavish feast.

name: Widowmaker
info: Requires Level 44, 63 Dex, 90 Int
description: 100% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Full Life
1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life on Critical Strike
flair: Love only death
For she shall never let you go.

name: Heartbreaker
info: Requires Level 50, 71 Dex, 102 Int
description: 10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge

If your mind is sharp enough.

name: Arakaali's Fang
info: Requires Level 53, 58 Dex, 123 Int

name: The Consuming Dark

description: +1 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
30% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Your Chaos Damage has 60% chance to Poison Enemies

name: Sanguine Gambol

description: 40% increased Attack Damage against Bleeding Enemies
50% chance to cause Bleeding on Critical Strike
You have Crimson Dance if you have dealt a Critical Strike Recently
flair: The night dances on
Wine continues to flow
Your skin looking pale
Your soul letting go

name: Taproot
info: Requires Level 60, 113 Dex, 113 Int
description: 0.5% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana against Poisoned Enemies
0.5% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Maimed Enemies

name: Mark of the Doubting Knight
info: Requires Level 64, 76 Dex, 149 Int
description: +5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
50% chance to Cause Bleeding on Critical Strike
50% chance to Cause Poison on Critical Strike

Slice open the Innocent
And spill a thousand Sins.

name: Bino's Kitchen Knife
info: Requires Level 65, 81 Dex, 117 Int

that it was even edible.

name: Divinarius
info: Requires Level 66, 95 Dex, 131 Int
description: (80-100)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

when you do it yourself.

name: White Wind

description: 20% chance to Dodge Attack Hits while your Off Hand is empty

but they dare not whisper the name
of the demon that flies on Winter's gales.

name: Vulconus
info: Requires Level 68, 76 Dex, 149 Int

(70-100)% increased Physical Damage with Hits and Ailments against Ignited Enemies

+2000 Armour while you do not have Avatar of Fire

after a time, cooled and hardened.
The world protecting its beating heart
with a thick, black scab.

name: Gorebreaker

But this'll soften them up.

name: Brightbeak
flair: "I know how to say 'faster' and 'attack' in Karui, Marak and Ezo."
- Voll of Thebrus

name: Lavianga's Wisdom
flair: "The painful memories are the easiest to recall."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

name: Flesh-Eater
description: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
30% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
3% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Bleeding Enemies
flair: I suffer, I long, with thirst to slake.
Though countless corpses lie in wake.

name: Clayshaper
description: Minions' Attacks deal (5-8) to (12-16) additional Physical Damage

flair: There is nothing, flesh, spirit, or stone
Free from our hunger for dominion.

name: Frostbreath
description: Attacks with this Weapon deal Double Damage to Chilled Enemies
