Robbing breath from the weak and worthless.

name: Cameria's Avarice
description: Trigger Level 20 Icicle Burst when you Kill a Frozen Enemy
40% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Frozen Enemies
(30-40)% increased Cold Damage with Attack Skills

"But then I wouldn't have everything I want, would I?"

name: Cameria's Maul
description: (30-40)% increased Cold Damage with Attack Skills
40% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Frozen Enemies
flair: "You'll have my riches when you pry them from my cold, dead hands!"
"That's how I prefer it."

name: Mjölner
info: Requires Level 60, 412 Str, 300 Int
description: (30-40)% increased Lightning Damage with Attack Skills
Trigger a Socketed Lightning Spell on Hit
Socketed Lightning Spells deal 100% increased Spell Damage if Triggered
flair: Look the storm in the eye and you will have its respect.

name: Callinellus Malleus
description: (15-25)% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon
All Attack Damage Chills when you Stun
flair: To neither ebb nor flow, but weather the rising tide, outlast, unshifting and unshifted, until the waters recede and we stand together.

name: Nebuloch
description: Gain (30-40)% of Physical Attack Damage as Extra Fire Damage
+4% to Chaos Resistance per Endurance Charge
1% reduced Elemental Damage taken when Hit per Endurance Charge
Adds 5 to 8 Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
200 Fire Damage taken per second per Endurance Charge if you've been Hit Recently

the creature would age and perish.
But time would not touch the fiend.

name: Axiom Perpetuum
info: Requires Level 10, 22 Str, 22 Int

Adds (2-3) to (5-6) Cold Damage to Spells
Adds 1 to (10-12) Lightning Damage to Spells
flair: The worst of Axiom were imprisoned by more than iron.

name: Spine of the First Claimant
info: Requires Level 20, 38 Str, 38 Int
description: 40% increased Damage with Hits against Frozen Enemies
+(25-35)% to Cold Damage over Time Multiplier
flair: Thousands gazed upon the doors of the great labyrinth,
at an Eternal Champion in steel and gold,
The first to challenge its treacherous traps.
To mark the occasion, Izaro had the Champion's remains gilded.

name: Brutus' Lead Sprinkler
info: Requires Level 28, 51 Str, 51 Int
description: Adds 4 to 7 Fire Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Strength
flair: "A sprinkle of liquid encouragement is often required
to garnish the perfect confession."
- Brutus, Warden of Axiom

name: Bitterdream
info: Requires Level 32, 52 Str, 62 Int
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Hypothermia
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Ice Bite
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Cold Penetration
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Mana Leech
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Added Cold Damage
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Reduced Mana
flair: Fight not the cold
Forsake hope
Be still.

name: The Dark Seer
info: Requires Level 32, 52 Str, 62 Int
description: 7% Global chance to Blind Enemies on hit
flair: Feed on the light of the living,
Bring darkness to all I see,
Until we are one in shadow.

name: Earendel's Embrace
info: Requires Level 35, 62 Str, 62 Int

Summoned Skeletons take (15-30)% of their Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
Summoned Skeletons have Avatar of Fire
flair: There the weary multitude of man-kind
shall turn in their masses into the wide fire,
where the destroying flame embraces the living,
some will go up, some down, filled with misery.

name: Nycta's Lantern
info: Requires Level 41, 59 Str, 85 Int
description: +2 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Fire Penetration
+(6-10) Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Socketed Gems deal 63 to 94 additional Fire Damage
flair: Left in her tomb by the lynch mob,
the flame inside still blazed bright after her death,
and so did hers.

name: The Supreme Truth
info: Requires Level 41, 59 Str, 136 Int
flair: Knowledge brings power, and with power you can
grab truth by the throat and shape it as you wish.

name: Cerberus Limb
info: Requires Level 47, 81 Str, 81 Int
description: 0.5% of Spell Damage Leeched as Life if Equipped Shield has at least 30% Chance to Block
+1 to Maximum Energy Shield per 5 Armour on Equipped Shield
+5 to Armour per 5 Evasion Rating on Equipped Shield
+20 to Evasion Rating per 5 Maximum Energy Shield on Equipped Shield
flair: The greatest of guardians make the greatest of sacrifices.

name: Death's Hand
info: Requires Level 56, 96 Str, 96 Int
description: 30% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Stun
Gain Unholy Might for 4 seconds on Critical Strike
flair: "All are welcome in Hinekora's eternal home."
- Karui Proverb

name: Balefire
info: Requires Level 60, 95 Str, 131 Int
description: Recover (1-3)% of Maximum Life on Kill
Recover (1-3)% of Maximum Mana on Kill
flair: After the fires swept down from the sky and swallowed the city,
all that lingered, as if locked in time,
was a memory of that which was gone, a whisper of deeds undone.

name: Singularity
info: Requires Level 62, 113 Str, 113 Int
description: Adds (30-40) to (60-70) Lightning Damage to Spells
Nearby Enemies are Hindered, with 25% reduced Movement Speed
(60-80)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Hindered Enemies
flair: In time, all becomes nothing.
We just expedite the process.

name: Doon Cuebiyari
info: Requires Level 64, 113 Str, 113 Int
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Iron Will
1% increased Damage per 8 Strength when in Main Hand
1% increased Armour per 16 Strength when in Off Hand
flair: My Iron heart will beat when yours is rust.
I take your Strength, your power, your lust.
By Iron Will alone I set my mind in motion.
Through endless storms of fervent devotion.

name: Breath of the Council
info: Requires Level 66, 113 Str, 113 Int
description: Chaos Skills have 40% increased Skill Effect Duration
flair: Breathe deep, and give yourself over to eternity.

name: Augyre
info: Requires Level 68, 104 Str, 122 Int
description: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Every 16 seconds you gain Elemental Overload for 8 seconds
You have Resolute Technique while you do not have Elemental Overload
100% increased Physical Damage while you have Resolute Technique
flair: When the world spins out of control,
the safest place to be is in the centre.

name: Mon'tregul's Grasp
info: Requires Level 68, 104 Str, 122 Int
description: Enemies killed by Zombies explode dealing Fire Damage
flair: With death as my ally, all the world is within my grasp.

name: Nebulis
info: Requires Level 68, 104 Str, 122 Int
description: (15-20)% increased Cold Damage per 1% Cold Resistance above 75%
(15-20)% increased Lightning Damage per 1% Lightning Resistance above 75%
flair: The vastness of the cosmos holds energies beyond comprehension, should one have the fortitude to grasp them.

name: Doryani's Catalyst
info: Requires Level 75, 113 Str, 113 Int
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Elemental Proliferation
0.2% of Elemental Damage Leeched as Life
flair: The result of the catalytic reaction would be either immortality for all,
or death for all. It was a risk Doryani was willing to take.

name: Hrimnor's Hymn
description: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
flair: "The crack of bone, the spray of blood.
Is there sweeter music?"
- Hrimnor of the Ezomytes.

name: Quecholli
description: Enemies killed explode dealing 10% of their Life as Fire Damage
flair: "The finest prosperity grows from the direst
carnage. Such is the nature of progress."
- Doryani of the Vaal

name: Geofri's Baptism
flair: "One quick tap is all the persuasion you'll need."
- Archbishop Geofri of Phrecia Cathedral

name: Hrimnor's Dirge
description: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain 50% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
flair: The last sweet music to touch Hrimnor's ears passed right beneath his chin.

name: Chober Chaber
description: +1 to Level of Socketed Melee Gems
+1 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
flair: The faithful may continue to serve, even after death.

name: Trypanon
description: All Attacks with this Weapon are Critical Strikes
flair: "Though ingenius instruments have been found,
it seems surgery before thaumaturgy
was not so delicate."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 3546

name: Jorrhast's Blacksteel
description: 25% chance to Trigger Level 20 Animate Weapon on Kill
Weapons you Animate create an additional copy
flair: His flesh had long turned to dust,
but his vengeance lived on
in every scrap of iron he touched.

name: Voidhome
description: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
flair: Cursed is the star whence it came.

name: Marohi Erqi
description: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Increased Area of Effect
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Increased Pulverise
flair: Lumbering as a sea lion, clumsy as a berry-drunk pigeon. That was Erqi.

flair: With a fire burning brash in his golden eye,
Marceus fired his arrow into the pitch-dark sky,
And seared the hope of surprise,
From Kaom's skulking horde.

name: Poacher's Aim
flair: A sharp eye can be more deadly than a sharp blade.

name: Primordial Eminence
description: Golems have (16-20)% increased Attack and Cast Speed
30% increased Effect of Buffs granted by your Golems
flair: "Kings fall, empires crumble, mortals perish.
All turn to earth and sand."
- Maraketh proverb

name: Primordial Harmony
description: Golem Skills have (20-30)% increased Cooldown Recovery Speed
Golems have (30-45)% increased Cooldown Recovery Speed
(16-20)% increased Golem Damage for each Type of Golem you have Summoned
Golems regenerate 2% of their Maximum Life per second
flair: "A stone is not a stone,
It is but one part of a fortress."
- Ezomyte proverb

name: Primordial Might
description: (25-30)% increased Damage if you Summoned a Golem in the past 8 seconds
Golems Summoned in the past 8 seconds deal (35-45)% increased Damage
flair: "Do not cause the land to stir,
It holds secrets better unknown."
- Azmerian proverb

name: Pugilist
description: 1% increased Evasion Rating per 3 Dexterity Allocated in Radius
1% increased Claw Physical Damage per 3 Dexterity Allocated in Radius
1% increased Melee Physical Damage with Unarmed Attacks per 3 Dexterity Allocated in Radius
flair: The best dancers often make the best fighters.

name: Pure Talent
description: While your Passive Skill Tree connects to the Duelist's starting location, you gain:
1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
While your Passive Skill Tree connects to the Ranger's starting location, you gain:
While your Passive Skill Tree connects to the Shadow's starting location, you gain:
While your Passive Skill Tree connects to the Witch's starting location, you gain:

Melee Skills have 15% increased Area of Effect
flair: The skilled know how to learn.
The talented know who to learn from.

name: Rain of Splinters
flair: "If one is an annoyance
then a hundred is a threat."
- Ancient Karui Proverb

name: Rapid Expansion
description: With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Ground Slam has a 35% chance
to grant an Endurance Charge when you Stun an Enemy
With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Ground Slam
flair: Chitus began to aggressively expand his empire
into neighbouring nations at great human cost.
But for absolute power, there is no price
that a Perandus won't pay.

name: Reckless Defence
description: Hits have +(140-200)% additional Critical Stike Chance against you
flair: There's no motivation for genius
quite like desperation.

name: Ring of Blades
description: With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Ethereal Knives fires Projectiles in a Nova
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Ethereal Knives fires 5 additional Projectiles
flair: At night, as a young Daresso shared his bed with a woman whose name he could not recall,
his thoughts remained in the one place he called his own: The Grand Arena.

name: Rolling Flames
description: With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Fireball Projectiles gain Radius as they travel farther, up to +4 Radius
flair: From north to south the sea of fire swept,
Rolling waves of gorging flame,
Growing taller and hungrier,
With every land they consumed.

name: Shattered Chains
description: With at least 40 Strength in Radius, 20% increased
Rarity of Items dropped by Enemies Shattered by Glacial Hammer
flair: The prisoners of the empire raised their shackled hands.
Begging to be delivered from Corruption.
The rebellion smote their chains,
And gave them the freedom to choose corruption for themselves.

name: Soul's Wick
description: (50-40)% reduced Mana Cost of Raise Spectre
Spectres have (800-1000)% increased Critical Strike Chance
Spectres have a Base Duration of 20 seconds
Spectres do not travel between Areas
flair: Candles with the brightest light
Bring life to death and day to night.
But lovely as the glow may seem,
Their light is fleeting, as a dream...

name: Spire of Stone
description: 3% increased Totem Life per 10 Strength Allocated in Radius
flair: The strongest Karui tribes left the longest impressions on the land.
Their symbols served as guidance many generations
after their creators had been buried deep beneath the earth.

name: Spirit Guards
description: With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Animate Weapon can Animate up to 8 Ranged Weapons
flair: Long after the Karui passed through,
the whispers of those who stood their ground
at Lioneye's Watch could be heard amongst the rubble.

name: Spirited Response
description: With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, 10% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit during Rallying Cry for you and Allies
flair: The Purity Rebels fought with heart and soul,
To free their empire from corruption.
And the fires of war did merely serve,
To temper the steel of their spirits.

name: Spreading Rot
description: With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Blight inflicts Withered for 2 seconds
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Blight has 50% increased Hinder Duration
flair: The Cataclysm was but the first act in a play of horrors.
The dead lingered, and the living began to rot.

name: Static Electricity
description: Adds 1 maximum Lightning Damage to Attacks per 1 Dexterity Allocated in Radius
Adds 1 to 2 Lightning Damage to Attacks
flair: "Movement expends energy, but perhaps a little of that energy
can be recaptured and... reappropriated."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

name: Steel Spirit
description: With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, each Spectral Throw Projectile gains 5% increased Damage each time it Hits
flair: The Sekhema rode to the mountain,
With her tribe, devoted and strong.
And sewed shut the mouth of nightmare,
So that it would not consume her world.

name: Sudden Ignition
description: With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Burning
Arrow can inflict an additional Ignite on an Enemy
flair: After years of subterfuge, sabotage, and sacrifice,
Sarn had become a powder keg just waiting to explode.
Finally, Victario lit the match.

name: Survival Instincts
flair: Observe and master your surroundings.

name: Survival Secrets
flair: Nature provides its own solutions.

name: Survival Skills
flair: A helping hand has long reach.

name: Tempered Flesh
description: -1 Strength per 1 Strength on Allocated Passives in Radius
+5% to Critical Strike Multiplier per 10 Strength on Unallocated Passives in Radius
flair: We are born raw and untested, and we are shaped by life.

name: Tempered Mind
description: -1 Intelligence per 1 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius
+100 to Accuracy Rating per 10 Intelligence on Unallocated Passives in Radius
flair: Any thought, no matter how fleeting, changes the thinker.

name: Tempered Spirit
description: -1 Dexterity per 1 Dexterity on Allocated Passives in Radius
+15 to Maximum Mana per 10 Dexterity on Unallocated Passives in Radius
flair: Though the body rots, the spirit lives on.

name: The Anima Stone
description: Can Summon up to 1 additional Golem at a time
+1 to maximum number of Summoned Golems if you have 3 Primordial Items Socketed or Equipped
flair: All revere the earth they walk,
For it wields strength beyond compare,
Holds knowledge more than thought,
Stands long after all else falls.

name: The Blue Dream
description: Gain 5% of Lightning Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Passives granting Lightning Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant an equal chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill
flair: We crash against Chayula's body,
and fall like rain into the place we cannot go.

name: The Blue Nightmare
description: Gain 5% of Lightning Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Passives granting Lightning Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant Chance to Block Spell Damage at 35% of its value
Passives granting Lightning Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant an equal chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill
flair: We swell and flood
and drown the undeserving beneath our might.

name: The Golden Rule
description: Bleeding you inflict is Reflected to you
+1% to Chaos Resistance per Poison on you
Poison you inflict is Reflected to you
flair: Hurt as you would be hurt.

name: The Green Dream
description: Gain 5% of Cold Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Passives granting Cold Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant an equal chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
flair: We climb like vines up Chayula's arms,
reaching into the world that should be ours.

name: The Green Nightmare
description: Gain 5% of Cold Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Passives granting Cold Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant Chance to Dodge Attack Hits at 35% of its value
Passives granting Cold Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant an equal chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
flair: We take root in the dirt
and strangle those who tread upon it.

name: The Long Winter
description: With 40 Intelligence in Radius, Glacial Cascade has an additional Burst
With 40 Intelligence in Radius, 20% of Glacial Cascade Physical Damage
flair: In the years that followed the twisted sky,
cold winds cloaked Wraeclast in snow.
The pure-white blanket masked a black heart
that lay dormant deep beneath the earth.

name: The Red Dream
description: Gain 5% of Fire Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Passives granting Fire Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant an equal chance to gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
flair: We flow like blood into Chayula's open mouth,
and spill into the land we have watched forever.
This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Chayula

name: The Red Nightmare
description: Gain 5% of Fire Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Passives granting Fire Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant Chance to Block Attack Damage at 35% of its value
Passives granting Fire Resistance or all Elemental Resistances in Radius
also grant an equal chance to gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
flair: We coagulate; a crimson shell
that suffocates the unworthy.

name: The Vigil
description: With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Vigilant Strike
Fortifies you and Nearby Allies for 12 seconds
flair: When Voll took the throne,
He swore to care for the empire with eyes open.
And so he looked to the salvation of his people,
Blind to the damnation in his hands.

name: To Dust
flair: "Death need not be a permanent ailment."
- Kadavrus, Surgeon to the Umbra

name: Transcendent Flesh
description: -1 Strength per 1 Strength on Allocated Passives in Radius
1% additional Physical Damage Reduction per 10 Strength on Allocated Passives in Radius
+5% to Critical Strike Multiplier per 10 Strength on Unallocated Passives in Radius
flair: We are as much shaped by what we do as what is done to us.

name: Transcendent Mind
description: -1 Intelligence per 1 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius
0.4% of Energy Shield Regenerated per Second for
every 10 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius
+100 to Accuracy Rating per 10 Intelligence on Unallocated Passives in Radius
flair: A keen mind sees what others do not, makes connections where others do not, and is dangerous in a way that others are not.

name: Unending Hunger
description: Minions have (6-8)% increased Area of Effect
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Raised Spectres have a 50% chance to gain Soul Eater for 30 seconds on Kill
flair: They roamed, they fed, they grew,
Killing as they went,
Conquer though they may,
Their hearts will never be content.

name: Unnatural Instinct
description: Allocated Small Passive Skills in Radius grant nothing
Grants all bonuses of Unallocated Small Passive Skills in Radius
flair: "I don't know how I know,
I just know that I know."

name: Unstable Payload
description: (8-12)% Chance for Traps to Trigger an additional time
flair: Saboteurs, like chefs, have their own secret recipes.

name: Violent Dead
description: With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Raised
Zombies' Slam Attack has 100% increased Cooldown Recovery Speed
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Raised Zombies' Slam
flair: "Rage, malice, hunger - some traits are more easily carried across the barrier of death."
- Kadavrus, Surgeon to the Umbra

name: Warlord's Reach
description: +1 to Melee Weapon and Unarmed Attack range
flair: A steady hand can hold back an army.

name: Watcher's Eye
flair: One by one, they stood their ground against a creature
they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.

name: Weight of the Empire
description: With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Heavy Strike has a
flair: Ondar not only betrayed his emperor,
He betrayed his friend.
And in his dying moments, Chitus ensured,
That Ondar felt the full weight of his guilt.

name: Wildfire
description: With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Molten Strike fires 2 additional Projectiles
With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Molten Strike has 25% increased Area of Effect
flair: News of Kaom's victory in the south spread quickly.
Those in support of the coming rebellion bided their time.
The rest fled like rats from a fire.

name: Winter Burial
description: With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Glacial Hammer deals
Cold-only splash Damage to surrounding targets
With at least 40 Strength in Radius, 25% of Glacial Hammer Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
flair: Exposure led to the deaths of many slaves.
And it was the duty of slaves to bury the dead in the frozen ground.
A growing circle of misery and death
that the elite were all to happy to sustain.

name: Winter's Bounty
description: With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Cold Snap grants Power Charges instead of Frenzy Charges when Enemies die in its Area
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Cold Snap's Cooldown can be bypassed by Power Charges instead of Frenzy Charges
flair: As a boy, Rigwald was taught to hunt,
Through the first snows of winter,
When beasts have gorged their fill,
And see nothing but the long slumber ahead.

name: Ancient Waystones
description: 60% reduced Mana Cost of Totem Skills that cast an Aura
flair: "The Vaal left a thousand warnings behind.
We ignored every single one."
- Siosa, the Last Scholar

name: Atziri's Reign
flair: Atziri went to great lengths to ensure her immortality,
but nothing is eternal.

name: Blood Sacrifice
description: 1% of maximum Mana gained on Kill
Removes 1% of maximum Life on Kill
Removes 1% of maximum Energy Shield on Kill
flair: Power always comes with a price.

name: Brittle Barrier
description: 20% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
10% increased Damage taken while on Full Energy Shield
flair: Walls built in a hurry fall in a hurry.

name: Chill of Corruption
description: 50% chance to gain an additional Vaal Soul per Enemy Shattered
flair: Even a millennium later, Atziri's presence
casts a shroud over Wraeclast.

name: Combustibles
flair: The hotter something burns, the less is left at the end.

name: Corrupted Energy
description: With 5 Corrupted Items Equipped: 50% of Chaos Damage does not bypass Energy Shield, and 50% of Physical Damage bypasses Energy Shield
flair: Nothing is immune to the Nightmare's twisted influence.

name: Fevered Mind
flair: In sickness, the insane becomes sane.

name: Fragility
flair: "Your flesh will fail you."

name: Hungry Abyss
description: With 5 Corrupted Items Equipped: Life Leech recovers based on your Chaos Damage instead
flair: Darkness can never be sated.

name: Mutated Growth
description: 10% increased Experience Gain for Corrupted Gems
flair: Few living things survived the cleansing flames.
Those that did thrived...
And changed...

name: Pacifism
flair: "Your fear will overcome you."

name: Powerlessness
flair: "Your desires will mislead you."

name: Sacrificial Harvest
description: (20-30)% chance to gain an additional Vaal Soul on Kill
flair: The Vaal used human sacrifice to power their empire.
They, too, eventually sought means to
make their machines run more efficiently.

name: Self-Flagellation
description: (10-20)% increased Damage per Curse on you
An additional Curse can be applied to you
flair: Beg for forgiveness.

name: Vaal Sentencing
description: (80-120)% increased Vaal Skill Critical Strike Chance
flair: In their final days, every crime was punishable by death.
Atziri's empire ran on blood, but the blood was running dry.

name: Weight of Sin
flair: Ill will is the greatest of burdens.

name: Poorjoy's Asylum
flair: Laughs of all the twisted
Echo through these halls of gold.
In this cold forgotten void
They wander, forever uncontrolled.

name: Doryani's Machinarium
description: Found Items have a 10% chance to drop Corrupted in Area
flair: Unique Boss is augmented by Player choices
We are ever the makers of our own undoing.

name: The Perandus Manor
flair: Forget kings and emperors;
He who holds the coin holds all the power.

name: Olmec's Sanctum
description: Final Boss drops higher Level Items
flair: They flew, and leapt, and clambered over,
They crawled, and swam, and slithered under.
Still its ancient secrets await unclaimed
And of this hidden temple, only legends remain.

name: The Vinktar Square
description: Monsters deal 35% extra Damage as Lightning
flair: To the east,
it cannot be seen.
To the west,
it cannot be touched.
To the south,
it cannot be remembered.
And to the north,
it cannot be contained.

name: Whakawairua Tuahu
description: Curses have 50% reduced effect on Monsters
Rare Monsters each have a Nemesis Mod
flair: We all began life in darkness, we shall all end it there.

name: Pillars of Arun
description: Area contains unbridged gaps to cross
Monsters have 50% chance to Avoid Ailments
Players have 200% increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for Movement Skills
flair: Man creates where nature cannot.

name: The Coward's Trial
description: Area has (30-50) seconds between monster waves
flair: For his sins he was hunted in his sleep,
judgement wrought of twisted nightmare.
The Coward bound his dreams to stone, awaiting
another to walk the path of true atonement.

name: The Twilight Temple
description: Area is inhabited by Lunaris fanatics
Area is inhabited by Solaris fanatics
flair: In the shadow of war,
all are eclipsed.

name: Acton's Nightmare
description: Area has patches of burning ground
20 patches with Ground Effect per 100 tiles (Hidden)
Ground Effect has a radius of 14 (Hidden)
flair: Curious, she shook it then,
And tiny screams emerged.
Curiouser, she shook again,
And an eerie silence purred.

name: Maelström of Chaos
description: Area has patches of chilled ground
20 patches with Ground Effect per 100 tiles (Hidden)
Ground Effect has a radius of 14 (Hidden)
Monsters deal 50% extra Damage as Lightning
Monsters are Immune to randomly chosen Elemental Ailments or Stun
Monsters' Melee Attacks apply random Curses on Hit
flair: Whispers from a world apart
Speak my name beyond the tomb;
Bound within the Maelström's heart,
Will they grant me strength or doom?

name: Oba's Cursed Trove
description: Area has patches of desecrated ground
20 patches with Ground Effect per 100 tiles (Hidden)
Ground Effect has a radius of 10 (Hidden)
Area becomes fatal after some time
flair: "Here the soil is more deadly than any swing of the axe."
- Oba of the Karui, Conqueror of Corruption.

name: Vaults of Atziri
description: Found Items have a (20-40)% chance to drop Corrupted in Area
flair: "Should I depart this mortal coil,
so shall all of my treasures."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

name: Hall of Grandmasters
flair: The grandest and greatest ever to fight,
Divine the champions stand tall.
But match their power, best their might,
And even the immortal may fall.

name: Mao Kun
description: Monsters deal (175-190)% extra Damage as Lightning
Monsters gain an Endurance Charge on Hit
Monsters gain a Power Charge on Hit
flair: The Treasures of the Tides wait
in agony at the End of the World.

name: The Putrid Cloister
description: Players are Cursed with Projectile Weakness
flair: Please take out your blades,
your whips, and your spikes.
Class is now in session.

name: Death and Taxes
description: Unique Boss has (25-30)% increased Attack and Cast Speed
flair: So the raiders danced,
leading their foe ever west,
towards certain death.

name: Hallowed Ground
flair: Some dead have long envied the living.
When given the chance, they take from us what they can.
So we offer our suffrage.
In return, they give only suffering.

name: Caer Blaidd, Wolfpack's Den
flair: Howls and laughter
They hide in the day
They smell you, they watch you
They track their new prey
